fullText: Diosqoros of Gozarto https://gedsh.bethmardutho.org/Diosqoros-of-Gozarto http://syriaca.org/bibl/182 173 http://syriaca.org/person/243 person Bp. and author. brief (13th/14th cent. ) [ Syr. Orth. ] Bp. and author. Born in Barṭelle , his baptismal name was Gabriel. He was consecrated bp. of Gozarto d-Qardu (Cizre) in 1285/6. He was the author of a verse biography of Bar ʿEbroyo and of his brother Barṣawmo Ṣafī and of an Anaphora preserved in several mss. (not yet published). Sources Barsoum, Scattered pearls , 485–86. Y.  Çiçek ( ed. ), Diosqoros d-Gozarto. Mimro ʿal qadišo Grigoriyos maphryono d-hu Bar ʿEbroyo (Glane/Losser, 1985). E.  Renaudot, Liturgiarum Orientalium Collectio , vol. 2 (1847), 489–504.
